summary.span: 提供对创建和计划 对象的支持。

span.span: Provides support for creating and scheduling objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks .NET Framework 提供了两个工厂用于创建和计划任务：The .NET Framework provides two factories for creating and scheduling tasks: - 类，该类创建和对象。The class, which creates and objects. - 类，该类创建对象。The class, which creates objects. 类使您可以执行以下操作：The class allows you to do the following: - 创建任务并通过调用立即启动方法。Create a task and start it immediately by calling the method. 您可以调用此方法创建和执行的任务需要非默认自变量的重载。You can call the overloads of this method to create and execute a task that requires non-default arguments. > [!WARNING] > 从开始[!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)]，则方法提供了使用默认配置值创建一个任务并立即开始的最简单方法。Starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)], the method provides the easiest way to create a task with default configuration values and start it immediately. - 创建数组中的任务的任何一个已通过调用完成时启动任务或方法。Create a task that starts when any one of the tasks in an array has completed by calling the or method. - 创建数组中的所有任务都完成通过调用时将启动任务或方法。Create a task that starts when all the tasks in an array have completed by calling the or method. 静态属性返回的默认对象。The static property returns a default object. 您还可以调用之一类构造函数来配置对象的类创建。You can also call one of the class constructors to configure the objects that the class creates. 下面的示例配置一个新对象来创建具有指定的取消标记、 任务创建选项、 延续选项和自定义的任务计划程序的任务。The following example configures a new object to create tasks that have a specified cancellation token, task creation options, continuation options, and a customized task scheduler. [!code-csharp[TPL_Factories#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Misc/tpl_factories/cs/factoriestresult.cs#2)] [!code-vb[TPL_Factories#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Misc/tpl_factories/vb/factoriestresult.vb#2)] 在大多数情况下，您不需要实例化一个新实例。In most cases, you do not have to instantiate a new instance. 相反，可以使用静态属性，它返回一个工厂对象，将使用默认值。Instead, you can use the static property, which returns a factory object that uses default values. 然后可以调用其方法来启动新任务或定义任务延续。You can then call its methods to start new tasks or define task continuations. 有关说明，请参阅示例。For an illustration, see the example. ## Examples 下面的示例使用静态属性以使两个调用方法。The following example uses the static property to make two calls to the method. 第一个任务返回一个字符串数组，而第二个返回填充的用户的 MyDocuments 目录的子目录名称的字符串数组，使用用户的 MyDocuments 目录中文件的名称填充。The first task returns a string array that is populated with the names of files in the user's MyDocuments directory, while the second returns a string array that is populated with the names of subdirectories of the user's MyDocuments directory. 然后，它调用方法，显示他们已完成执行后返回的两个任务的数组中的数量的文件和目录的信息。It then calls the method, which displays information about the number of files and directories in the arrays returned by the two tasks after they have completed execution. [!code-csharp[System.Threading.Tasks.Task.Factory#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.threading.tasks.task.factory/cs/factory2.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Threading.Tasks.Task.Factory#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.threading.tasks.task.factory/vb/factory2.vb#2)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用`StartNew`功能上等效于使用之一中创建任务构造函数，并调用方法来执行计划。Calling `StartNew` is functionally equivalent to creating a task by using one of the constructors, and then calling the method to schedule it for execution. 但是，除非必须分隔创建和计划，`StartNew`是简易性和性能的推荐的方法。However, unless creation and scheduling must be separated, `StartNew` is the recommended approach for both simplicity and performance.

span.span: Creates and starts a task.
The started task.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用`StartNew`功能上等效于使用之一中创建任务构造函数并调用方法来执行计划。Calling `StartNew` is functionally equivalent to creating a task by using one of the constructors and then calling the method to schedule it for execution. 但是，除非必须分隔创建和计划，`StartNew`是简易性和性能的推荐的方法。However, unless creation and scheduling must be separated, `StartNew` is the recommended approach for both simplicity and performance.
